oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fagala, Albert.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Albert A, Fagala. Ca. 1870s. Tintype in paper holder. 1 pc. Identified by seller as Albert A. Fagala who lived in Sevier County, TN. Born 1823?-- died January 23, 1892. Son of Michael and Nancy McCallis (McCallie?) Fagala. Lived in the Trundles Crossroads area of Sevier County and he is buried at Trundles Crossroads.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Tintypes;
